sqlMap.insert: insert into nboard(unq, title, pass, name, content, hits, rdate) values(board_seq.nextval, #title#, #pass#, #name#, #content#, 0, sysdate)
sqlMap.select:
select b.* from ( select rownum rn, a.* from ( select rownum, unq, title, name, hits, to_char(rdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') rdate from nboard
where $searchGubun$ like '%$searchText$%'
order by unq desc ) a)
b where rn>=#startIndex# and rn <=#endIndex#

select count(*) from nboard
where $searchGubun$ like '%$searchText$%'
select unq, title, pass, name, content, hits, to_char(rdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') rdate from nboard where unq='$unq$'
sqlMap.update: update nboard set hits=hits+1 where unq=#unq#
update nboard set title=#title#, content=#content#, name=#name# where unq=#unq#
sqlMap.select: select count(*) from nboard where unq=#unq# and pass=#pass#
